Class.name: Application.PD.QueryProduction
Class.Description: Classname Application.PD.QueryProduction Summary 查询服务应用程序 Version 1.0 Date 2021年1月20日 09:00

XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Application.PD.QueryProduction" TestingEnabled="true" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description>查询业务应用程序</Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="患者信息查询服务BS" Category="查询服务管理" ClassName="Application.SOAP.BS.QueryService" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="患者查询服务" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigNames">信息查询流程BP</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="信息查询SQL服务BO" Category="查询服务管理" ClassName="Application.SQL.BO.Query" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="患者信息服务BO" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DSN">JDBCJH</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="JGService">JavaGateway服务</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="JavaGateway服务" Category="查询服务管理" ClassName="EnsLib.JavaGateway.Service" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="JavaGateway服务" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="信息查询流程BP" Category="查询服务管理" ClassName="Application.BP.QueryManage" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> </Item> </Production>
